button.resource_packs.export_loaded: Export current loaded resources as zip
button.resource_packs.no_version: Pack doesn't specify a game version it was made for
button.resource_packs.outdated_version: Pack is for an older game version, issues may arise
button.resource_packs.outdated_game: Pack is for a newer game version, issues may arise
button.resource_packs.incorrect_game: This resource pack is for a different game, issues WILL arise
button.resource_packs.error: An unknown error occured when importing your pack
button.resource_packs.error.no_pack_json: The pack you tried to import has no pack.json, aborting...
button.resource_packs.error.no_pack_id: The pack you tried to import has no ID, aborting...
